textBeforeTable: Architecture College of Architecture and the Built Environment Click Here to go to the University Bookstore For Educational Hardware and Software Discounts General questions may be directed to the Technology Help Desk at 215-951-4648 or send questions and comments to: HelpDesk@PhilaU.edu There is also a link to the University Bookstore for laptop bundles at educational prices that meet the requirements. Incoming Philadelphia University freshmen are required to have a laptop computer. Freshmen can find their program major link below to determine what computer to bring to campus this fall.
